body_html: We can only judge how complex this is when someone makes a PR and we can see it. In general, we would prefer to avoid adding much complexity as the scoping code has grown a lot anyway and the issue of specifying a few times instead of once doesn't seem to be that pressing, except if I'm missing something.

body: We can only judge how complex this is when someone makes a PR and we can see it. In general, we would prefer to avoid adding much complexity as the scoping code has grown a lot anyway and the issue of specifying a few times instead of once doesn't seem to be that pressing, except if I'm missing something.
